page.title: 17TRANSPORT-VEHICLE DATA.
page.content: Data was collected on the {Llanrhos } and {Marine Road}approaches to Llandudno.Out of an approximate total of 7880 vehicles travelling along Llanrhos Road during the working day,4420 travelled into Llandudno and 3460 out. The majority of vehicles were cars (85%) and vans (8%) with lorries,buses and 'other' forms of transport counting 7%.Of the cars, 26% were FORD,19% AUSTIN ROVER and 7% VAUXHALL.As above ,an approximate total of 7580 vehicles travelled along Marine Road.Of these,4320 vehicles travelled into Llandudno and 3260 out.The majority of vehicles were cars (87%) but 'others' accounted for 14%.Of the cars 32% were FORD,20% AUSTIN ROVER and 13% VAUXHALL.The new link road to the Expressway is now under construction.
